title: 5-Year-Old Boy In US Dies After Being Left In Hot Car For 7 Hours
content: The woman, who reportedly cares for five more children, was detained and charged with child abuse by negligence, which resulted in death.
summary: The woman, who reportedly cares for five more children, was detained and charged with child abuse by negligence, which resulted in death.

title: "It Was God Alone Who Prevented...": Trump On Assassination Attempt
content: Donald Trump said Sunday it was divine intervention that helped him survive an assassination attempt during a campaign rally in Pennsylvania, and called on Americans to unite.
summary: Donald Trump said Sunday it was divine intervention that helped him survive an assassination attempt during a campaign rally in Pennsylvania, and called on Americans to unite.

title: Russia Accuses Biden Government Of Creating Atmosphere For Attack On Trump
content: The Kremlin said on Sunday it did not believe the US administration was responsible for Saturday's assassination attempt on US presidential candidate Donald Trump, but that it had created an atmosphere that provoked the attack.
summary: The Kremlin said on Sunday it did not believe the US administration was responsible for Saturday's assassination attempt on US presidential candidate Donald Trump, but that it had created an atmosphere that provoked the attack.

title: K P Sharma Oli Becomes Nepal's Prime Minister For 3rd Time
content: K P Sharma Oli was appointed Nepal's Prime Minister for the third time on Sunday to lead the new coalition government that faces the daunting challenge of providing political stability in the country.
summary: K P Sharma Oli was appointed Nepal's Prime Minister for the third time on Sunday to lead the new coalition government that faces the daunting challenge of providing political stability in the country.

title: On Camera, Alleged Trump Shooter Lays On Stomach With Rifle On Roof
content: A gunman lays on his stomach on a rooftop with a rifle in hand, then screams ring out, a video published by US outlet TMZ on Saturday shows.
summary: A gunman lays on his stomach on a rooftop with a rifle in hand, then screams ring out, a video published by US outlet TMZ on Saturday shows.

title: Video: How A Head Tilt Helped Trump Dodge The Bullet During Campaign Rally
content: Donald Trump dodged a bullet, literally. The 78-year-old had just started his speech during a Saturday campaign rally in Butler, Pennsylvania when the shots rang out and one of the bullets grazed his ear.
summary: Donald Trump dodged a bullet, literally. The 78-year-old had just started his speech during a Saturday campaign rally in Butler, Pennsylvania when the shots rang out and one of the bullets grazed his ear.

title: 4 Dead In Birthday Party Shooting In France
content: Four people, including the shooter, died late Saturday when a man opened fire on a birthday party in a village in France, authorities said.
summary: Four people, including the shooter, died late Saturday when a man opened fire on a birthday party in a village in France, authorities said.

title: Analysis: Attack On Trump Could Spark Further US Political Violence
content: In a country already on edge, the assassination attempt on former President Donald Trump has enraged his supporters, paused the Democratic campaign, and raised fears of further political violence in the run-up to November's election.
summary: In a country already on edge, the assassination attempt on former President Donald Trump has enraged his supporters, paused the Democratic campaign, and raised fears of further political violence in the run-up to November's election.

title: Zoologist Adam Britton Faces 249-Year Jail For Raping, Killing Over 60 Dogs
content: The final hearing for the case involving zoologist Adam Britton, a British crocodile expert, was adjourned on Thursday after his lawyer produced a fresh report to the judge. The court will now hear the case in August.
summary: The final hearing for the case involving zoologist Adam Britton, a British crocodile expert, was adjourned on Thursday after his lawyer produced a fresh report to the judge. The court will now hear the case in August.

title: Jeff Bezos Praises Donald Trump's "Grace And Courage" After Assassination Bid
content: The 45th US President was hit in the ear in an assassination bid by a gunman at a campaign rally in Pennsylvania today.
summary: The 45th US President was hit in the ear in an assassination bid by a gunman at a campaign rally in Pennsylvania today.

title: "Right-Wing Leaders Now Active Targets": Himanta Sarma After Trump Shot At
content: Wishing former US President Donald Trump a swift recovery after he survived an assassination attempt yesterday, Assam Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma has said right-wing leaders across the globe "are now active targets of the radical left"
summary: Wishing former US President Donald Trump a swift recovery after he survived an assassination attempt yesterday, Assam Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma has said right-wing leaders across the globe "are now active targets of the radical left"

title: Alec Baldwin's First Reaction After Manslaughter Case Dismissed
content: Actor Alec Baldwin has broken his silence following the dismissal of involuntary manslaughter charges against him by a New Mexico judge in connection with the tragic shooting incident on the set of the film 'Rust'.
summary: Actor Alec Baldwin has broken his silence following the dismissal of involuntary manslaughter charges against him by a New Mexico judge in connection with the tragic shooting incident on the set of the film 'Rust'.

title: Trump Rally Shooter Was A Maths Whiz At School, Had Won $500 Prize
content: The FBI identified 20-year-old Thomas Matthew Crooks of Bethel Park, Pennsylvania as the suspect in Saturday's attempted assassination of former US President Donald Trump at a campaign rally.
summary: The FBI identified 20-year-old Thomas Matthew Crooks of Bethel Park, Pennsylvania as the suspect in Saturday's attempted assassination of former US President Donald Trump at a campaign rally.

title: "Act Of God": Vivek Ramaswamy After Trump Survives Assassination Bid
content: Indian-American entrepreneur Vivek Ramaswamy today condemned the attack on former US President Donald Trump, who got hit on his ear during an attempt on his life at an election rally in Butler, Pennsylvania.
summary: Indian-American entrepreneur Vivek Ramaswamy today condemned the attack on former US President Donald Trump, who got hit on his ear during an attempt on his life at an election rally in Butler, Pennsylvania.

title: Trump Shooter Was Seen Moving From Roof To Roof, Claims Witness
content: Two witnesses at Donald Trump's election rally in Pennsylvania, where he was attacked, claimed to have seen the shooter, with one recalling how the gunman moved from roof to roof, apparently scouting for a perfect perch to shoot.
summary: Two witnesses at Donald Trump's election rally in Pennsylvania, where he was attacked, claimed to have seen the shooter, with one recalling how the gunman moved from roof to roof, apparently scouting for a perfect perch to shoot.

title: "Take Stock Of Policies Inciting Hatred": Russia To US After Trump Attack
content: Moscow called on the United States Sunday to "take stock" of its "policies of incitement to hatred", while using the assassination attempt on former president Donald Trump to denounce support for Ukraine.
summary: Moscow called on the United States Sunday to "take stock" of its "policies of incitement to hatred", while using the assassination attempt on former president Donald Trump to denounce support for Ukraine.

title: Heatwaves, Floods Disrupt Education, Increase Learning Loss: UNESCO Report
content: Climate related stressors like heat, wildfires, floods, droughts, diseases and rising sea levels affect education outcomes and threaten to undo educational gains of recent decade, according to the Global Education Monitoring Report (GEM).
summary: Climate related stressors like heat, wildfires, floods, droughts, diseases and rising sea levels affect education outcomes and threaten to undo educational gains of recent decade, according to the Global Education Monitoring Report (GEM).

title: Donald Trump's Security To Be Boosted After Shooting At Pennsylvania RallyD
content: Donald Trump's campaign team has announced plans to bolster security protocols to ensure his safety after the former US president was injured in a shooting incident at an election rally in Pennsylvania.
summary: Donald Trump's campaign team has announced plans to bolster security protocols to ensure his safety after the former US president was injured in a shooting incident at an election rally in Pennsylvania.

title: "Horrific Moment": How US Media Reported Attack On Donald Trump
content: The assassination attempt on former president Donald Trump is a "horrific moment" for America and a "sobering reminder" of the threat that political violence poses to democracy in the country ahead of the high-stakes presidential election.
summary: The assassination attempt on former president Donald Trump is a "horrific moment" for America and a "sobering reminder" of the threat that political violence poses to democracy in the country ahead of the high-stakes presidential election.

title: What Is AR-15 Rifle Used By Trump Rally Shooter And Why Is It Dangerous
content: FBI has identified the person who fired shots at former US President Donald Trump during his rally in Pennsylvania on Saturday. The suspect has been identified as Thomas Matthew Crooks.
summary: FBI has identified the person who fired shots at former US President Donald Trump during his rally in Pennsylvania on Saturday. The suspect has been identified as Thomas Matthew Crooks.
